channel.title: [Faction Suggestion]The Madness
channel.description:
# <font color = "Gold">The Mad Scientist</font>
**Madness Special**
**Passive (Immortal)** - Immune to death at night and bleeding.
**Day Ability (Book of Secrets)** - Target a player , to become the next Mad Scientist when you died. (1 use) [Starter Mad Scientist]
**Night Ability (Observe)** - Determine a player is it a killer/offensive or not. (Infinite Uses)
**Night Ability (Perform Operation)** - Convert a non-Neutral Killer to Frankenstein. (Infinite Uses) [1 day cooldown]. When a player occupies you , that player is converted instead.
# <font color = "Gold">The Frankenstein</font>
**Madness Killer**
**Passive (Fail Experiment)** - If your previous class is not a Killer/Offensive, you would die after 2 days.
**Passive (Immune Body)** - Immune to bleeding.
**Passive (Fear of Replacement)** - If there is another new Frankenstein, you will be grief and died.
**Night Ability (Who Wants A Hug)** - Targe a player, or a player that occupied you, that player is killed. (Infinite Uses)
**Goal:** Defeat **The Blue Dragon**
